screen.the-virus-block.purification_tote: Disable boobytraps and starve the worms.
Strip away every protective layer around the Virus Block.
Crush the Virus Block's maximum health threshold.
Bleed away half of the Virus Block's remaining health. (Easy only)
screen.the-virus-block.difficulty.title: Virus Difficulty
screen.the-virus-block.difficulty.warnin: Be aware that placing the virus block may lead
to the entire destruction of your world.
message.the-virus-block.block_locked: The infection is too resilient right now.
message.the-virus-block.teleport: The Virus Block shifts to a new location!
message.the-virus-block.shells_collapsed: The Virus Block shells collapse and cannot reform!
message.the-virus-block.singularity_diss: [Virus Alert] Singularity has dissipated. World resetting...
message.the-virus-block.singularity_deto: [Virus Alert] Singularity detonated; collapse disabled by operators.
message.the-virus-block.purification.no_: Trap placements disabled. Worm activity will plummet.
Shell defenses collapse around the Virus Block!
message.the-virus-block.purification.max: Containment clamps down, slashing the Virus Block's max health.
The Virus Block's max health cannot drop any further.
message.the-virus-block.purification.ble: Stability surge! The Virus Block loses half of its power.
The Virus Block is already at minimum stability.
Only Easy difficulty allows this ritual.
message.the-virus-block.purification_tot: Keep the totem in your hand to finish the ritual.
Boobytraps are already disabled; the totem lies dormant.
message.the-virus-block.difficulty.locke: The overseers have locked the virus difficulty.
message.the-virus-block.starter.granted: A mysterious Virus Block hums in your hands...
message.the-virus-block.starter.totem: You feel a Purification Totem snapping to your palm.
message.the-virus-block.inventory.single: [Virus Alert] There is 1 Virus Block in player inventories.
message.the-virus-block.inventory.plural: [Virus Alert] There are %s Virus Blocks in player inventories.
message.the-virus-block.inventory.contai: [Virus Alert] There is 1 Virus Block hiding in world containers.
[Virus Alert] There are %s Virus Blocks hiding in world containers.
message.the-virus-block.inventory.pickup: [Virus Alert] %s picked up a Virus Block!
message.the-virus-block.inventory.burned: [Virus Alert] A Virus Block was incinerated!
message.the-virus-block.helmet_ping_here: [Augmented Helmet] Virus signal directly beneath you!
message.the-virus-block.infectious_conta: [Virus Alert] The cube beneath you is infectious!
message.the-virus-block.infectious_inven: [Virus Alert] Handling Infectious Cubes is making you ill!
message.the-virus-block.void_tear.pull: [Virus Alert] Gravitational forces are pulling you!
message.the-virus-block.void_tear.push: [Virus Alert] Shockwave forces are pushing you!
message.the-virus-block.shield_field.rej: The virus rejects the cocoon! Feedback surge!
message.the-virus-block.barrier_offline: [Virus Alert] Core defenses have gone offline!
message.the-virus-block.adaptation: The virus adapts! %s now deals %s%% less damage.
message.the-virus-block.purification_tot: The infection is dormant. The totem has no effect.
message.the-virus-block.infection.warnin: This world is in danger of annihilation...
commands.the-virus-block.difficulty.play: Only players can use this command.
difficulty.the-virus-block.easy.name: Easy
difficulty.the-virus-block.easy.desc: The infection crawls. Shells stay gentle and the Bleed option is available.
difficulty.the-virus-block.medium.name: Medium
difficulty.the-virus-block.hard.name: Hard
difficulty.the-virus-block.hard.desc: Canonical experience: standard spread and defenses.
difficulty.the-virus-block.extreme.name: Extreme
difficulty.the-virus-block.extreme.desc: Aggressive spread and max-health drained each tier.
